titleStmt.title: Office of the Secretary of State of Kentucky

availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

org.orgName: Office of the Secretary of State of Kentucky

body.p: The Secretary of State of Kentucky records all the official acts of the governor and serves as the notary public for commonwealth. Secretaries of State from 1860 to 1865: Thomas B. Monroe, Jr. (August 1859-October 1861); Nathaniel Gaither, Jr. (October 1861-August 1862); Daniel Carmichael Wickliffe (August 1862-September 1863); Ephraim Van Winkle (September 1863-May 1866).
